data.title: Measurements of Geometric Quantities in an Automatic Line for the Verification of Large-Size Rings and Rims
data.meta_description: The article describes an automatic inspection line for forged-rolled products. The line comprises a cleaning station using shot blasting, an ultrasonic testing system to reveal possible internal defects in the product, a station for verifying geometric sizes, and a...
